alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wellington, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Lake Worth, Palm Beach, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Palm Springs, Haverhill, Cloud Lake, Palm Beach International Airport, Golden Lakes, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Gun Club Estates, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, The Acreage and Lake Clarke Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
